content:
The enemy complex of long visual observation was amazed in the Kharkiv direction.

AppropriateThe video posted on March 24State Border Service of Ukraine.

According to the department, the depths of the Guard of the on the offensive "Steel border" caused the impact. They hit the "Mur-P" with jewelry accuracy, leaving the enemy without observation.

Asreported the armyinform, three howitzers and a mortar position of the enemy were destroyed by Terrobron.
title: Defense forces destroyed the next "Mur-P"
